description: Want juicy lamb souvlaki, crunchy Greek salad and creamy yoghurt in 20 minutes? This recipe is for you. Try it for a superb Greek-style dinner tonight.
name: Easy Greek-Style Souvlaki Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g Woolworths BBQ lamb kebabs with honey & mint

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Brush kebabs all over with oil. Cook for 15 minutes, turning, or until cooked through.
Meanwhile, grill bread for 1 minute on each side or until lightly charred and warmed through. Cut bread into wedges.
Prepare salad according to packet instructions. Divide salad and bread among bowls.
Top with kebabs and yoghurt. Serve with lemon wedges.
